info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:18PM MDT until June 02 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Sierra County in south central New Mexico... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 417 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Monticello, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rock House. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 95 and 115. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
